about_the_game:
Is waiting boring? Want to be more aggressive, but still maintain a stable economy? Do you want to rush the opponent with cheap and expendable units? Wait no longer!

Introducing the Raiders alliance! part of the mercenary faction; these barbarians plunder gold from every kill, start with a huge economy, and have a lot of cheap fast units at your disposal! combine their abilities and army with others of the same faction to create an unstoppable early game powerhouse!

Includes the following:
Camp - Weak starting building that grants the player 40 extra gold at the start of the game.
Raider's alliance - gain 10 gold from every enemy unit killed. Double that amount if a building was destroyed.
Berserker unit - Powerful unit that can attack twice per turn.
Horsemen units - Two units that have double the movement speed.
Cheap units - Weaker but lost cost units to hoard the opponent with.
Barracks - A building that allows you to spawn units anywhere on the map.
